content: To authenticate a user, send a POST request to /login with username and password.
API keys must be included in the Authorization header using Bearer token.
Refresh tokens can be used to obtain a new access token without logging in again.
Password reset is done using /reset-password endpoint and email verification.
OAuth2 authentication flow requires client id and client secret.
Use HTTPS for all API requests to ensure encrypted communication.
Rate limiting prevents abuse by restricting number of API calls per minute.
Pagination can be implemented using limit and offset query parameters.
